Solutions

Metric Suite

It is designed to provide for the need of organizations world over to monitor and manage performance across all tiers as daily operational activities of the workforce are linked with corporate strategic goals and objectives of the organization on the go. It is designed to aid the organization in the generation and utilization of both quantitative and qualitative data required for effective performance and appraisal management within the organization.

Metric Suite- Statement of Purpose

There presently exist several performance management software solutions, but most of which still require users to independently acquire appraisal data. The generation of the required data be it around task turnaround time management, job quality rating and job volume or quantity rating is a major challenge for most performance management experts. This is one of the various problems Metric Suite Performance Management Software is designed to solve. Below are some of the basis for the development of the software: • Automated extraction of result knitted performance appraisal data. • The need to be able to link employee’s daily operational activities with the set strategic objectives of the business. • Ability to effectively analyze performance data for the needs of users within each organization. For a demo, click here

HR Metrics (Performance Appraisal Data Generation Framework Development)

HR Metric is designed to aid the development of a performance management system that links the corporate strategic objectives with company-wide employee daily operational activities. It also provides for the development of a framework that simplify and aid the generation of required performance management data.

Features: HR Metric -Features

The HR Metric is developed to provide for the development of both the data structure and the data generation framework as well as having to process the data for effective transformation into usable form for decision makers.

Identifying the required data for performance appraisal and management as well as ensuring that the data are well or effectively structured is very important and this need is well provided by the Metric Source.

The functionality of Metric Source therefore can be said to provide comprehensively for the need of organizations with regard to their performance management requirements.

Development of performance management system.
Development of performance data generation framework.
Analysis and re-presentation of performance appraisal/management outcomes.

For a demo, click here

Performance Management System Development

For an organization to achieve a good level of performance (strategic goals and objectives achievement), its vision, aims and objectives ought to be developed into corporate strategic policies which further devolves into measurable bits derived from critical success factors and key performance indicators identified in the strategic plan. When the above listed is done, this can be followed up by the development of a good performance management framework. We implement the Balanced Scorecard performance management framework, the number one strategy-based performance management framework that aids in the translation of organizational vision into actions. Also, we develop bespoke HR scorecard for organizations that desires something outside the balanced scorecard framework.
For a demo, click here

Key Performance Measures Development (KPI Analytics)

The development of a good strategy, well defined processes and good performance management system is key to the success of every organization. However, most performance management system lacks the required inputs to drive the strategy execution successfully. The responsible factor for the aforementioned revolves around the ambiguity surrounding the development of the required performance measures. Extracting result based key performance measures for an average staff could be cumbersome most times, our key performance measures development solution is designed to help organizations deliver on targets through the identification and driving of strategic outcome-based performance measurement. The process revolving around; the effective analysis of strategic objectives, and job functions is simplified by our key performance measures development.
For a demo, click here
